QuestData.Title: The Collector
QuestData.Description: This note is a schedule with a list of days and times when a person -- described only as "The Collector" -- will receive a shipment of gold from the mines in Elwynn Forest.$B$BFrom the schedule, it looks as if the Collector resides near the Brackwell Pumpkin Patch in eastern Elwynn.$B$BThis sounds important. You should report it to Marshal Patterson at Eastvale Logging Camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Marshal Patterson at the Eastvale Logging Camp in Elwynn Forest and give him The Collector's Schedule.
QuestData.CompletionText: What?!? We haven't had our people working the Elwynn mines for months!$B$BLet me see that note you have...
QuestData.RewardText: Hm... I have heard of this "Collector" but I don't know whom he's working for. Thank you for the schedule. It will help us solve this mystery.
